languages.text: "Я покинула Крударах потому, что таков был мой {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Путь{/g}! Разве не этому вы учите нас с самого появления на свет и до последних мгновений жизни? Я прекрасно слышу скорбный плач братьев и сестер, замученных в этой комнате. Хотела бы не слышать, но не могу! Как и слышу мелодию страданий вашей души. Но не смейте... не нужно обвинять меня в том, что с вами случилось!" {n}Ирлиэт напряженно стискивает челюсть и пропускает несколько вдохов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я покинула Крударах потому, что таков был мой {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Путь{/g}! Разве не этому вы учите нас с самого появления на свет и до последних мгновений жизни? Я прекрасно слышу скорбный плач братьев и сестер, замученных в этой комнате. Хотела бы не слышать, но не могу! Как и слышу мелодию страданий вашей души. Но не смейте... не нужно обвинять меня в том, что с вами случилось!" {n}Ирлиэт напряженно стискивает челюсть и пропускает несколько вдохов.{/n}

languages.text: "I left Crudarach because that was my {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}! Is that not what you have been teaching us from birth until the final moments of our lives? I can hear it very well, the mournful lament of our brothers and sisters tortured to death in this room. I would prefer not to hear it, but I cannot! As clearly as I hear the melody of your soul's torment. But don't you dare... There is no need to blame me for what happened to you!" {n}Yrliet clenches her jaw and seems to stop breathing entirely.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я покинула Крударах потому, что таков был мой {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Путь{/g}! Разве не этому вы учите нас с самого появления на свет и до последних мгновений жизни? Я прекрасно слышу скорбный плач братьев и сестер, замученных в этой комнате. Хотела бы не слышать, но не могу! Как и слышу мелодию страданий вашей души. Но не смейте... не нужно обвинять меня в том, что с вами случилось!" {n}Ирлиэт напряженно стискивает челюсть и пропускает несколько вдохов.{/n}

As clearly as I hear the melody of your soul's torment. But don't you dare— there is no need to blame me for what happened to you!" {n}Yrliet clenches her jaws tensely and misses a few breaths.{/n}

I can hear it very well, the mournful lament of our brothers and sisters tortured to death in this room. I would prefer not to hear it, but I cannot! As clearly as I hear the melody of your soul's torment. But don't you dare... There is no need to blame me for what happened to you!" {n}Yrliet clenches her jaw and seems to stop breathing entirely.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Me fui de Crudarach porque lo exigía mi {g|Encyclopedia:Path}senda{/g}! ¿No es eso lo que nos inculcáis desde que nacemos hasta los últimos instantes de nuestra vida? Puedo oír perfectamente los quejidos lastimeros de nuestros hermanos y hermanas, torturados hasta la muerte en esta misma sala. ¡Preferiría no oírlos, pero no lo puedo evitar! Tan claramente como oigo la melodía del tormento de tu alma. Pero no te atrevas a... ¡No puedes culparme a mí por lo que os ha pasado!». {n}Yrliet aprieta la mandíbula; casi parece que ha dejado de respirar del todo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I left Crudarach because that was my {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}! Is that not what you have been teaching us from birth until the final moments of our lives? I can hear it very well, the mournful lament of our brothers and sisters tortured to death in this room. I would prefer not to hear it, but I cannot! As clearly as I hear the melody of your soul's torment. But don't you dare... There is no need to blame me for what happened to you!" {n}Yrliet clenches her jaw and seems to stop breathing entirely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Me fui de Crudarach porque lo exigía mi {g|Encyclopedia:Path}senda{/g}! ¿No es eso lo que nos inculcáis desde que nacemos hasta los últimos instantes de nuestra vida? Puedo oír perfectamente los quejidos lastimeros de nuestros hermanos y hermanas, torturados hasta la muerte en esta misma sala. ¡Preferiría no oírlos, pero no lo puedo evitar! Tan claramente como oigo la melodía del tormento de tu alma. Pero no te atrevas a... ¡No puedes culparme a mí por lo que os ha pasado!». {n}Yrliet aprieta la mandíbula; casi parece que ha dejado de respirar del todo.{/n}

languages.text: 「私がクルダラを去ったのは、それが私の{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道{/g}だったからだ！それこそが、我々が生まれてから人生の最期を迎えるまで、あなたが教えてきたことではないのか？この部屋で拷問され、死んでいく兄弟姉妹の悲痛な挽歌が、私にはよく聞こえる。望んではいないが、聞こえてしまうのだ！あなたの魂の苦しみが旋律として聞こえるのと同じようにね。だが言っておくが…あなたの身に起きたことで、私が責められるいわれはない！」{n}ユリエットは歯を食いしばり、完全に息を止めたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I left Crudarach because that was my {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}! Is that not what you have been teaching us from birth until the final moments of our lives? I can hear it very well, the mournful lament of our brothers and sisters tortured to death in this room. I would prefer not to hear it, but I cannot! As clearly as I hear the melody of your soul's torment. But don't you dare... There is no need to blame me for what happened to you!" {n}Yrliet clenches her jaw and seems to stop breathing entirely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私がクルダラを去ったのは、それが私の{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道{/g}だったからだ！それこそが、我々が生まれてから人生の最期を迎えるまで、あなたが教えてきたことではないのか？この部屋で拷問され、死んでいく兄弟姉妹の悲痛な挽歌が、私にはよく聞こえる。望んではいないが、聞こえてしまうのだ！あなたの魂の苦しみが旋律として聞こえるのと同じようにね。だが言っておくが…あなたの身に起きたことで、私が責められるいわれはない！」{n}ユリエットは歯を食いしばり、完全に息を止めたようだ。{/n}

languages.text: “我离开克鲁达拉赫是，因为那就是我的{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道途{/g}！从我们出生，到生命的最后一刻，你们不是一直都是这么教导我们的吗？在这个房间里被折磨至死的兄弟姐妹们，他们在放声惨叫，我听得很清楚！我也希望我可以不听，但我做不到！我能清楚地听到你的灵魂中痛苦的旋律，但这不意味你能……你遭遇的事情不能怪我！”{n}伊莉耶特咬紧牙关，似乎完全停止了呼吸。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I left Crudarach because that was my {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}! Is that not what you have been teaching us from birth until the final moments of our lives? I can hear it very well, the mournful lament of our brothers and sisters tortured to death in this room. I would prefer not to hear it, but I cannot! As clearly as I hear the melody of your soul's torment. But don't you dare... There is no need to blame me for what happened to you!" {n}Yrliet clenches her jaw and seems to stop breathing entirely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我离开克鲁达拉赫是，因为那就是我的{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道途{/g}！从我们出生，到生命的最后一刻，你们不是一直都是这么教导我们的吗？在这个房间里被折磨至死的兄弟姐妹们，他们在放声惨叫，我听得很清楚！我也希望我可以不听，但我做不到！我能清楚地听到你的灵魂中痛苦的旋律，但这不意味你能……你遭遇的事情不能怪我！”{n}伊莉耶特咬紧牙关，似乎完全停止了呼吸。{/n}

languages.text: « J'ai quitté Crudarach parce que c'était ma {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Voie{/g} ! N'est-ce pas là ce que vous nous apprenez dès la naissance et jusqu'à notre dernier souffle ? Je l'entends très bien, la triste complainte de nos frères et sœurs torturés dans cette pièce jusqu'à trouver la mort. Je préférerais ne pas l'entendre, mais c'est impossible ! Je l'entends aussi distinctement que la mélodie du tourment de votre âme. Mais ne pensez pas... Vous ne pouvez pas me blâmer pour ce qui vous est arrivé ! » {n}Yrliet serre la mâchoire et semble cesser de respirer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I left Crudarach because that was my {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}! Is that not what you have been teaching us from birth until the final moments of our lives? I can hear it very well, the mournful lament of our brothers and sisters tortured to death in this room. I would prefer not to hear it, but I cannot! As clearly as I hear the melody of your soul's torment. But don't you dare... There is no need to blame me for what happened to you!" {n}Yrliet clenches her jaw and seems to stop breathing entirely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai quitté Crudarach parce que c'était ma {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Voie{/g} ! N'est-ce pas là ce que vous nous apprenez dès la naissance et jusqu'à notre dernier souffle ? Je l'entends très bien, la triste complainte de nos frères et sœurs torturés dans cette pièce jusqu'à trouver la mort. Je préférerais ne pas l'entendre, mais c'est impossible ! Je l'entends aussi distinctement que la mélodie du tourment de votre âme. Mais ne pensez pas... Vous ne pouvez pas me blâmer pour ce qui vous est arrivé ! » {n}Yrliet serre la mâchoire et semble cesser de respirer.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich verließ Crudarach, weil das mein {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Pfad{/g} war! Ist es nicht das, was Ihr uns von Geburt bis zu den letzten Momenten unseres Lebens immer wieder gelehrt habt? Ich höre es ganz deutlich, hier in diesem Raum, das traurige Klagen unserer Brüder und Schwestern, als sie zu Tode gequält wurden. Ich will es nicht hören, aber ich höre es! So klar, wie ich die Melodie der Qualen Eurer Seele höre. Aber wagt es nicht ... Es gibt keinen Grund, mit die Schuld an dem zu geben, was Euch widerfahren ist!" {n}Yrliet beißt ihren Kiefer zusammen und scheint nicht mehr zu atmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I left Crudarach because that was my {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}! Is that not what you have been teaching us from birth until the final moments of our lives? I can hear it very well, the mournful lament of our brothers and sisters tortured to death in this room. I would prefer not to hear it, but I cannot! As clearly as I hear the melody of your soul's torment. But don't you dare... There is no need to blame me for what happened to you!" {n}Yrliet clenches her jaw and seems to stop breathing entirely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich verließ Crudarach, weil das mein {g|Encyclopedia:Pfad}Pfad{/g} war! Ist es nicht das, was Ihr uns von Geburt bis zu den letzten Momenten unseres Lebens immer wieder gelehrt habt? Ich höre es ganz deutlich, hier in diesem Raum, das traurige Klagen unserer Brüder und Schwestern, als sie zu Tode gequält wurden. Ich will es nicht hören, aber ich höre es! So klar, wie ich die Melodie der Qualen Eurer Seele höre. Aber wagt es nicht ... Es gibt keinen Grund, mit die Schuld an dem zu geben, was Euch widerfahren ist!" {n}Yrliet beißt ihren Kiefer zusammen und scheint nicht mehr zu atmen.{/n}

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Path}Yolum{/g} gereği Crudarach'tan ayrıldım! Doğduğumuz andan itibaren son nefesimizi verene dek bize öğrettiğiniz şey de bu değil mi? Bu odada gördükleri işkenceyle canlarından olan kardeşlerimizin matem dolu ağıtlarını pekâlâ duyabiliyorum. Duymamayı yeğlerdim ama elimde değil! Ruhunun çektiği eziyetin melodisi gibi tüm netliğiyle duyuyorum hem de. Ama sakın ola ki... Yaşadıkların yüzünden beni sorumlu tutmana gerek yok!" {n}Yrliet, çenesini sıkıyor. Nefes almayı tamamen kesmiş gibi duruyor.{/n}

I can hear it very well, the mournful lament of our brothers and sisters tortured to death in this room. I would prefer not to hear it, but I cannot! As clearly as I hear the melody of your soul's torment. But don't you dare... There is no need to blame me for what happened to you!" {n}Yrliet clenches her jaw and seems to stop breathing entirely.{/n}

Bu odada gördükleri işkenceyle canlarından olan kardeşlerimizin matem dolu ağıtlarını pekâlâ duyabiliyorum. Duymamayı yeğlerdim ama elimde değil! Nefes almayı tamamen kesmiş gibi duruyor.{/n}
